channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Auotmation -- 1756-EN2TPXT Series A
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Auotmation -- 1756-EN2TPXT Series A

item.title: CVE-2023-2262|2023-09-20T15:47:00.968Z -- rockwell%20auotmation -- 1756-en2tpxt%20series%20a
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the Rockwell Automation select 1756-EN* communication devices. If exploited, a threat actor could potentially leverage this vulnerability to perform a remote code execution. To exploit this vulnerability, a threat actor would have to send a maliciously crafted CIP request to device.
